WKFC_InspectionData.Num8: 361 East Lacey Road - Location # 1, Building #1;Forked River;NJ;08731

WKFC_InspectionData_SurveyInfo.Survey8: Ansul System w/ Semi-Annual Cleaning Contract - Two kitchens present. Both have Automatic Extinguishing Systems, Range Guard brand (not Ansul brand). Both hood and exhaust systems cleaned on semi-annual basis; last cleaned 02/2017. No Aluminum Wiring(Exclusion Endorsement) - No aluminum wiring noted.

WKFC_InspectionData_AddnandCATPerils.Peril11: Flooding/water Damage and Wind Damage possible if hurricane or strong northeastern winter storm occurs. Located approximately 235 miles from the Atlantic coast.

WKFC_InspectionData_Misc.Misc1: The business and property seems to be very well maintained and managed.

WKFC_InspectionData_BldgInfo.Bld46: Building consist of banquet halls on the 1st and 3rd floors. Restaurant and Bar is on the 2nd floor. Kitchens are on the 1st and 2nd floors.

WKFC_InspectionData_CommonHaz.CH12: Checked at panel box and outlets.
WKFC_InspectionData_CommonHaz.CH20: Closet/Mechanical Room. AC units part of heating system and also through the wall units are used.
WKFC_InspectionData_CommonHaz.CH47: All mechanicals are inspected annually and repaired or replaced when needed.

WKFC_InspectionData_NeighboringExposures.NE27: Neighborhood is a summer resort town located on the Forked River. Property is directly on the Forked River.

WKFC_InspectionData_OperationsOccupancy.Ops5: It is open 12 months of the year. Located in a summer resort town and 60% of business is done from May to October.
WKFC_InspectionData_OperationsOccupancy.Ops28: The insured is a Restaurant/Bar and Banquet Hall operation. Located on the Forked River in Forked River, NJ since 2014. The insured has 20 employees in the winter months and 70 employees in the summer months between May and October. The insured leases the 3 story, 20,500 sqft building. Subcontractors are used for site maintenance - snow removal and landscaping. Upkeep of the property is the responsibility of the landlord and insured. Insured declined to give financial information. The building is in good condition. No deferred maintenance issues were observed. The insured expressed a good attitude toward the survey, safety and risk management. The business and property seem to be very well maintained and managed.

WKFC_InspectionData_ProtectionSecurity.Prot36: Locked and secured when not on premises.
